message: and I'd just like to know what you guys think. http://craftno.de/

it is way too plain, like people like to know what they are getting beside the specs which are cool, but like what are plugins (make sure they can get a stat plugin, and the chat rely to IRC) i can install, what is the web interface if any that i can use to admin my site, how much are backups after 20gb (suggestion the more some one spends the more gb of backups they get), but it looks cool so far just needs details in those areas which isn't hard to do, also any coupons for convore?
The thing of the players is also confusing me

It can be cool, but I've not understood what kind of thing I'm gonna receive. If a branch for my bzr code that will be deployed or a cloud vm, like rackspace. It'll surely help a quotes from actual customers to improve the trust. And the about page, should have the real faces of the team
@panabee I actually found our name via your startup :D
This is a really, really cool idea!
@clone1018, awesome, thanks! pls help us spread the word and tweet the site would you?
also would you mind sharing thoughts on http://www.panabee.com/panabee ... what do you think of the page? like/eh/dislike?
